name: ZBiotics
headline: ZBiotics makes genetically engineered probiotics.
description: ZBiotics is a synthetic biology company founded in 2016 and headquartered in San Francisco, California. The company bioengineers probiotic bacteria for nutraceutical and other applications. They launched the world's first genetically engineered probiotic in 2019 – a probiotic that breaks down a toxic byproduct of alcohol. They are currently developing a pipeline of additional engineered probiotics for other consumer health applications.

founders.name: Zack Abbott, Founder/CEO
founders.description: I have a PhD in microbiology & immunology from the University of Michigan, where I enjoyed my research untangling complex and elegant webs of bacterial gene regulation. I did my undergrad at UC Berkeley, where I double-majored in immunology and classical art & archaeology. Prior to starting ZBiotics in 2016 and inventing our proprietary technology, I worked in clinical trial design as well as researching HIV vaccines and pursuing novel antibiotics in both academia and industry.

founders.name: Stephen Lamb, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder/COO at ZBiotics. Former experience in corporate real estate management, new market entry, and cross-border transactions. JD/MBA from Penn Law/Wharton.

![](https://zbiotics.com/cdn/shop/files/leadpace_multicircle.png?v=1713991377&width=1500) ![](https://zbiotics.com/cdn/shop/files/leadpace_multicircle.png?v=1713991377&width=700)
#  Your first drink of the night for a better tomorrow 
Genetically engineered by a team of PhD microbiologists, ZBiotics® Pre-Alcohol is a probiotic drink that breaks down the byproduct of alcohol responsible for rough mornings after drinking. 
[ Shop ](https://zbiotics.com/</products/zbiotics>)[ How it works ](https://zbiotics.com/</pages/how-it-works>)
Our Products 
##  Empower yourself from the inside out 
Our growing lineup of engineered probiotics is designed to enrich busy lives everywhere.
![](https://zbiotics.com/cdn/shop/files/preview_images/f07c5513109f4468ad3ad5aad5fe7d2c.thumbnail.0000000000_1500x.jpg?v=1723576264)
##  Pre-Alcohol 
Breaks down a toxic byproduct of alcohol called acetaldehyde while you drink and while you sleep — setting you up for a great next morning.
[ Buy Now ](https://zbiotics.com/</products/zbiotics>)
[ The Science ](https://zbiotics.com/</pages/how-it-works>)
![](https://zbiotics.com/cdn/shop/files/preview_images/e4467e620c7f4115aaf1a39d92b121d0.thumbnail.0000000000_1500x.jpg?v=1723576790)
##  Sugar-to-Fiber 
Produces an enzyme called levansucrase, which makes fiber using sugar from your diet, gently and all day long — improving microbiome health.
[ Buy Now ](https://zbiotics.com/</products/sugar-to-fiber>)
[ The Science ](https://zbiotics.com/</pages/how-sugar-to-fiber-works>)
Our Mission 
##  Better living through biotechnology 
We’re giving people access to the power of biotechnology using GMO probiotics. And we’re changing the conversation in the process. 
[ Learn More ](https://zbiotics.com/</pages/mission>)
![Woman stretching outdoors, embodying the ZBiotics mission of better living through biotechnology](https://zbiotics.com/cdn/shop/files/mission_desktop.png?v=1714123777&width=3000) ![Woman stretching outdoors, embodying the ZBiotics mission of better living through biotechnology](https://zbiotics.com/cdn/shop/files/mission_top_desktop_new.png?v=1714124852&width=3000)
##  The Science 
The world’s first genetically engineered probiotics: purpose-built to improve daily life.
  * ### Learn about Pre-Alcohol
[ Learn More ](https://zbiotics.com/</pages/how-it-works>)
![The science behind Pre-Alcohol](https://zbiotics.com/cdn/shop/files/Pre-Alcohol_TheScience_Illustrations_HomePage_Dark.png?v=1726593732&width=750)
We start with a natural probiotic bacteria you already eat every day, called _Bacillus subtilis._ We then used a process naturally honed by bacteria to insert the instructions for making ALDH into the bacteria’s genome...
  * ### Learn about Sugar-to-Fiber
[ Learn More ](https://zbiotics.com/</pages/how-sugar-to-fiber-works>)
![The science behind Sugar-to-FIber](https://zbiotics.com/cdn/shop/files/SugarToFiber_TheScience_Illustrations_HomePage_Dark.png?v=1726593732&width=750)
Fiber plays an important role in our health but most of us aren’t getting enough fiber in our modern diets. We need 25-30 grams of fiber per day but about 95% of us don’t meet that goal...

## [ Does ZBiotics Pre-Alcohol Probiotic Work for Every Body?  ](https://zbiotics.com/</blogs/journal/does-zbiotics-pre-alcohol-work-for-every-body> "Does ZBiotics Pre-Alcohol Probiotic Work for Every Body?")
##  You probably have some questions 
Check out our FAQs to find answers to common questions and feel free to reach out if you have more.
[ All FAQs ](https://zbiotics.com/</pages/faqs>)
### Did you launch a second product?
Yes. We are excited to announce that we have launched our second product and now have two products, built with the same technology but for different purposes:
[**ZBiotics® Pre-Alcohol**](https://zbiotics.com/<https:/zbiotics.com/products/zbiotics>)
**For easier mornings after drinking.**
Our original product, built to help you land on your feet the day after drinking alcohol by breaking down an unwanted byproduct called acetaldehyde while you drink and while you sleep—setting you up for a great next morning.
[**ZBiotics® Sugar-to-Fiber**](https://zbiotics.com/<https:/zbiotics.com/products/sugar-to-fiber>)
**For turning sugar into fiber in your gut**
Our second product, newly launched to help you make the most of a modern diet by converting sugar you eat into fiber in your gut, gently and all day long—improving microbiome health.
### What is ZBiotics® Pre-Alcohol Probiotic Drink?
ZBiotics Pre-Alcohol (or Pre-Alcohol for short) is a beverage containing a patented, genetically engineered probiotic (_B. subtilis_ ZB183™) that helps you land on your feet the day after drinking alcohol. It’s engineered to break down an unwanted byproduct of alcohol called acetaldehyde – the main culprit behind rough mornings after drinking ([citation](https://zbiotics.com/<https:/pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/8811162/>)).
### How does Pre-Alcohol work?
Pre-Alcohol is designed to replicate the natural process of your liver, but do it in your gut. We took a normal probiotic bacteria you already eat every day, and we bioengineered it to produce the same type of enzyme your liver produces ([citation](https://zbiotics.com/<https:/www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8461600/>)). That enzyme breaks down acetaldehyde – an unwanted byproduct of alcohol that accumulates in your gut when you drink.
Your liver does not have access to your gut. But by drinking Pre-Alcohol, the goal is to augment your gut’s natural ability to digest acetaldehyde while you drink and while you sleep – helping you make the most of the next day. Just remember that Pre-Alcohol won’t affect intoxication or make alcohol safer to drink, so always drink responsibly.[Learn more about how Pre-Alcohol works.](https://zbiotics.com/<https:/zbiotics.com/pages/how-it-works-1>)
### What is ZBiotics Sugar-to-Fiber Probiotic Drink Mix?
ZBiotics Sugar-to-Fiber (or “Sugar-to-Fiber” for short) is a drink mix containing a patented, genetically engineered probiotic (_B. subtilis_ ZB423™) that converts a small amount of the sugar you eat every day into fiber.
Specifically, Sugar-to-Fiber produces an enzyme called levansucrase, which breaks down molecules of a sugar called sucrose (also known as table sugar) and uses the components as building blocks to create a fiber called levan (a prebiotic fiber that is rare in most diets).
### How does Sugar-to-Fiber work?
Sugar-to-Fiber contains a genetically engineered probiotic, _Bacillus subtilis_ ZB423™,that takes a sugar called sucrose (table sugar) and uses it to create a fiber called levan. It does this by producing an enzyme called levansucrase. 
When you mix Sugar-to-Fiber into your drink, the probiotic bacteria are naturally dormant and in a protective state called an endospore. The bacteria in this endospore form can travel safely through your stomach and make it to the intestines, where they will “wake up” and start producing the enzyme levansucrase. This enzyme is capable of breaking down the sucrose you consume into its two individual molecular components: glucose and fructose. It then strings together the free fructose molecules into long chains to make molecules of levan fiber. 
Remember: at a molecular level, fibers are just long strings of simple sugars, but their different structures totally change how your body interacts with them. Levan is a rare and beneficial fiber that supports a healthy and diverse microbiome.
### What are the benefits of Sugar-to-Fiber?
The primary benefits of Sugar-to-Fiber relate to **microbiome health**. Sugar-to-Fiber is unlikely to break down enough sugar to impact things like caloric intake, blood sugar, or weight. 
But it will impact your gut health. Sugar-to-Fiber provides exactly what we know makes your microbiome healthier: 
  1. More soluble fiber,
  2. More fiber diversity,
  3. Gradual delivery of fiber throughout the day, and
  4. Diversion of intestinal sugar


And the benefits of a healthier microbiome for your body are vast and vary from person to person: better immune function, improved gut-lining integrity, improved bowel function, increased short-chain fatty acid synthesis, better nutrient utilization, improved energy, psychological benefits such as greater desire to exercise and cravings for healthier foods, and more.*
* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

##  You probably have some questions 
Check out our FAQs to find answers to common questions and feel free to reach out if you have more.
 All FAQs ⟨6⟩
### Did you launch a second product?
Yes. We are excited to announce that we have launched our second product and now have two products, built with the same technology but for different purposes:
**ZBiotics® Pre-Alcohol**⟨40⟩
**For easier mornings after drinking.**
Our original product, built to help you land on your feet the day after drinking alcohol by breaking down an unwanted byproduct called acetaldehyde while you drink and while you sleep—setting you up for a great next morning.
**ZBiotics® Sugar-to-Fiber**⟨41⟩
**For turning sugar into fiber in your gut**
Our second product, newly launched to help you make the most of a modern diet by converting sugar you eat into fiber in your gut, gently and all day long—improving microbiome health.
### What is ZBiotics® Pre-Alcohol Probiotic Drink?
ZBiotics Pre-Alcohol (or Pre-Alcohol for short) is a beverage containing a patented, genetically engineered probiotic (_B. subtilis_ ZB183™) that helps you land on your feet the day after drinking alcohol. It’s engineered to break down an unwanted byproduct of alcohol called acetaldehyde – the main culprit behind rough mornings after drinking (citation⟨42⟩).
### How does Pre-Alcohol work?
Pre-Alcohol is designed to replicate the natural process of your liver, but do it in your gut. We took a normal probiotic bacteria you already eat every day, and we bioengineered it to produce the same type of enzyme your liver produces (citation⟨43⟩). That enzyme breaks down acetaldehyde – an unwanted byproduct of alcohol that accumulates in your gut when you drink.
Your liver does not have access to your gut. But by drinking Pre-Alcohol, the goal is to augment your gut’s natural ability to digest acetaldehyde while you drink and while you sleep – helping you make the most of the next day. Just remember that Pre-Alcohol won’t affect intoxication or make alcohol safer to drink, so always drink responsibly.Learn more about how Pre-Alcohol works.⟨44⟩
### What is ZBiotics Sugar-to-Fiber Probiotic Drink Mix?
ZBiotics Sugar-to-Fiber (or “Sugar-to-Fiber” for short) is a drink mix containing a patented, genetically engineered probiotic (_B. subtilis_ ZB423™) that converts a small amount of the sugar you eat every day into fiber.
Specifically, Sugar-to-Fiber produces an enzyme called levansucrase, which breaks down molecules of a sugar called sucrose (also known as table sugar) and uses the components as building blocks to create a fiber called levan (a prebiotic fiber that is rare in most diets).
### How does Sugar-to-Fiber work?
Sugar-to-Fiber contains a genetically engineered probiotic, _Bacillus subtilis_ ZB423™,that takes a sugar called sucrose (table sugar) and uses it to create a fiber called levan. It does this by producing an enzyme called levansucrase. 
When you mix Sugar-to-Fiber into your drink, the probiotic bacteria are naturally dormant and in a protective state called an endospore. The bacteria in this endospore form can travel safely through your stomach and make it to the intestines, where they will “wake up” and start producing the enzyme levansucrase. This enzyme is capable of breaking down the sucrose you consume into its two individual molecular components: glucose and fructose. It then strings together the free fructose molecules into long chains to make molecules of levan fiber. 
Remember: at a molecular level, fibers are just long strings of simple sugars, but their different structures totally change how your body interacts with them. Levan is a rare and beneficial fiber that supports a healthy and diverse microbiome.
### What are the benefits of Sugar-to-Fiber?
The primary benefits of Sugar-to-Fiber relate to **microbiome health**. Sugar-to-Fiber is unlikely to break down enough sugar to impact things like caloric intake, blood sugar, or weight. 
But it will impact your gut health. Sugar-to-Fiber provides exactly what we know makes your microbiome healthier: 
  1. More soluble fiber,
  2. More fiber diversity,
  3. Gradual delivery of fiber throughout the day, and
  4. Diversion of intestinal sugar


And the benefits of a healthier microbiome for your body are vast and vary from person to person: better immune function, improved gut-lining integrity, improved bowel function, increased short-chain fatty acid synthesis, better nutrient utilization, improved energy, psychological benefits such as greater desire to exercise and cravings for healthier foods, and more.*
* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

generated_description:
ZBiotics is a San Francisco-based synthetic biology company founded in 2016, with a clear mission: they engineer genetically modified probiotics aimed at enhancing consumer health. They've made a splash in the health and wellness sector with the introduction of the world's first genetically engineered probiotic in 2019. This product is specifically designed to tackle a common problem: it helps break down acetaldehyde, a toxic byproduct of alcohol that contributes to hangovers. Think of it as your first line of defense for those Saturday nights out.

With a team of 22 dedicated employees backed by the support of Y Combinator’s Batch W18, ZBiotics is not just stopping at alcohol – they're also developing innovative probiotic solutions for various other health applications. Their latest addition to the product lineup is the **Sugar-to-Fiber** probiotic, which converts dietary sugar into fiber, promoting better gut health throughout the day.

ZBiotics taps into the burgeoning fields of synthetic biology, health and wellness, and food and beverage markets. Their products emphasize better living through biotechnology, aiming to empower consumers with scientifically-backed solutions for everyday issues. It’s worth noting that while ZBiotics provides promising health enhancements, their products aren't a cure-all.

Their current offerings include:
1. **ZBiotics Pre-Alcohol**: A tractable solution that works to minimize the impacts of alcohol by breaking down its byproducts as you consume it.
2. **ZBiotics Sugar-to-Fiber**: A cocktail mix that encourages gut health by transforming sugars into beneficial fibers, unlocking significant health benefits.

Located at 44 Montgomery St, San Francisco, ZBiotics is poised for growth as it continues to innovate in the health space while addressing consumer needs with flair. Their website, [ZBiotics.com](https://zbiotics.com/), is where you can learn more about their mission, products, and the science behind their technology.

In summary, ZBiotics stands out not only for its cutting-edge approach to probiotics but also for its commitment to harnessing biotechnology for better living—a goal we can all toast to.
